obfuscation: I say what 's going on; and you were crying when myself spoke to you, oh; as nothing; the beautiful evening-that 's all, and cheer inside the air; and cheer in the air, and you are not lonely like me; i say how 'd you how 'd you get into this?
original: I say; what's the matter? You were crying when I spoke to you. Oh! nothing. The beautiful evening-that's all. Cheer up! Cheer up! You are not lonelee, like me. I say, how did you how did you get into this?

obfuscation: be n't it an awfully hopeless kind in life; eyes it eyes, you had been wounded, just out inside hospital to-day, and awful war-- all the misery is because in the war, and when will it end; i say what nationality are you, rooshian; as really!
original: Isn't it an awfully hopeless sort of life? Yees, it ees. You haf been wounded? Just out of hospital to-day. The horrible war--all the misery is because of the war. When will it end? I say, what nationality are you? Rooshian. Really!

obfuscation: myself never met a Russian daughter, as myself say is it as bad as they make get out, as not when myself had anyone as ni-ice as you I never had had though, you stopped because I was sad others stop because I am gay.
original: I never met a Russian girl. I say, is it as bad as they make out? Not when I haf anyone as ni-ice as you; I never haf had, though. You stopped because I was sad, others stop because I am gay.

obfuscation: Balanced against, I am not fond inside men at all; and when you know-- you be not fond inside them; and well you barely know them at their better do you, you should see them in trenches, and by George, and they are simply splendid-- officers also men all blessed soul.
original: I am not fond of men at all. When you know--you are not fond of them. Well, you hardly know them at their best, do you? You should see them in the trenches. By George! They're simply splendid--officers and men, every blessed soul.

obfuscation: Besides, There 's never been anything like it-- only one long bit in jolly fine self-sacrifice it 's perfectly amazing, and i expect you 're not the last at that, and you see inside them what you had inside yourself myself 're thinking; oh n't a bit you 're absolutely out!
original: There's never been anything like it--just one long bit of jolly fine self-sacrifice; it's perfectly amazing. I expect you are not the last at that. You see in them what you haf in yourself, I think. Oh, not a bit; you're quite out!

obfuscation: myself assure you when we made attack where myself got wounded there was not a only man in my regiment who was not absolute hero; and way they went in-- never thinking in themselves-- it was simply lipping, it be same too perhaps along-- the enemy.
original: I assure you when we made the attack where I got wounded there wasn't a single man in my regiment who wasn't an absolute hero. The way they went in--never thinking of themselves--it was simply ripping. It is the same too, perhaps, with--the enemy.

obfuscation: Oh yeah, myself know that, ah; you are not mean man, yet how myself hate mean men, oh, and they are not mean really-- they simply do n't understand, oh, and you are a babe-- good babe be not you; and but I li-ke you for it.
original: Oh, yes! I know that. Ah! You are not a mean man. How I hate mean men! Oh! they're not mean really--they simply don't understand. Oh! You are a babee--a good babee aren't you? But I li-ke you for it.

obfuscation: It 's so good to finding ni-ice due; yet about being lonely, yet have not you any Russian friends, rooshian; and no; as the town be so been, were you at concert before you spoke to me; and yes; myself too, myself life music; and myself suppose all Russians do.
original: It is so good to find a ni-ice man. About being lonely? Haven't you any Russian friends? Rooshian? No. The town is so beeg. Were you at the concert before you spoke to me? Yes. I too. I lofe music. I suppose all Russians do.

obfuscation: myself go there always when I had the money; what, and are you as badly with ice as this?
original: I go there always when I haf the money. What! Are you as badly on the rocks as that?
